body:
Comment 7 by **giacomo.ritucci**: 
It's Kaspersky interfering with the execution of compilers and tests.

When K. is running sometimes as.exe fails to execute and each single test takes at least
30 secs so it's a pain to run all.bat

I just built go with Kaspersky disabled and then I added C:\MinGw, $GOROOT and $GOPATH
to Kaspersky safe zone list so I can develop and run go programs.

Sorry for the noise and thanks for the help.
